Can call code in other languages: COM, .NET, WebServices, Shared Libraries, DLL, NAG, R, JavaScript

Can be called from other languages: MATLAB, Excel, VisualBasic, Java, and C

Can call code in other languages: Java, .NET, C++, Fortran, CUDA, OpenCL, R

GUI creation support: GUI Widgets since v.0.9 but still incomplete
GUI Octave code can be used

Can call code in other languages: C via perlXS; C, Python, F77, etc. via Inline

Symbolic computation support: Yes and extended via Ryacas package

Can be called from other languages: Yes (any language that can call Python)
Yes (any language that can call Java)
